mapper.sql: a.sale_price, a.path_code, a.floor, a.ctn, a.stock, b.goods_code, b.goods_name, b.goods_name_en, b.spec, b.goods_detail, b.goods_detail_en, b.pic_url, b.made_in, b.market_price, d.type adsMiddleType, d.start_date, d.end_date, d.start_hms, d.end_hms, d.sale_price m_sale_price

a.sale_price, a.path_code, a.floor, a.ctn, a.stock, b.goods_code, b.goods_name, b.spec, b.goods_detail, b.goods_detail_en, b.pic_url, b.made_in, b.market_price, d.type adsMiddleType, d.start_date, d.end_date, d.start_hms, d.end_hms, d.sale_price m_sale_price

c.device_id_jp, c.device_id_supp, c.short_name, b.goods_code, b.goods_name, a.id, a.device_id, a.ctn, a.floor, a.path_code, a.sale_price, a.capacity, a.stock, a.warning_num, a.lack_level, c.lock_status
c.short_name , a.ctn, a.floor, a.path_code, a.sale_price, b.goods_name
mapper.select: SELECT FROM device_road a LEFT JOIN goods_sku b ON a.goods_sku_id=b.id INNER JOIN device c ON c.id=a.device_id WHERE a.id=#{id}
SELECT FROM device_road a INNER JOIN goods_sku b ON a.goods_sku_id=b.id INNER JOIN device c ON c.id=a.device_id WHERE device_id = #{_parameter} ORDER BY a.ctn,a.floor,a.path_code

SELECT FROM device_road a INNER JOIN goods_sku b ON a.goods_sku_id=b.id INNER JOIN device c ON c.id=a.device_id LEFT JOIN goods_ads_middle d ON d.goods_code = b.goods_code AND d.device_id=c.id WHERE c.device_id_jp=#{deviceIdJp} AND c.device_id_supp=#{deviceIdSupp}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device_road ( id, device_id, ctn, path_code, floor, goods_sku_id, sale_price, capacity, stock, warning_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES ( #{id}, #{deviceId}, #{ctn}, #{pathCode}, #{floor}, #{goodsSkuId}, #{salePrice}, #{capacity}, #{stock}, #{warningNum}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy}, now() )

INSERT INTO device_road ( id, device_id, ctn, path_code, floor, capacity, stock, warning_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.deviceId}, #{item.ctn}, #{item.pathCode}, #{item.floor}, #{item.capacity}, #{item.stock}, #{item.warningNum}, #{item.createBy}, now(), #{item.updateBy}, now() )
